snippet: Four long-serving directors will leave, and two new members have been named, following the resignation of the co-founder Jerry Yang.
abstract: Four long-serving directors will leave, and two new members have been named, following the resignation of the co-founder Jerry Yang.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED and EVELYN M. RUSLI

headline.main: Yahoo Board Shaken Up in a Push for Revival
headline.print_headline: Yahoo Board Shaken Up In a Push For Revival
